HEADER.NAME: Trinh Thanh Tung
HEADER.WHO_CONTENT: Web Developer focused on turning your ideas into high-performing, scalable systems. Currently building digital transformation tools.
HEADER.PAST_CONTENT_1: Over 4 years of experience building modern web applications with a focus on clean architecture and performance optimization.
HEADER.PAST_CONTENT_2: Contributed to production-ready systems for international markets like Singapore, Malaysia, and New Zealand. Expert in Angular, TypeScript, and Micro-frontend ecosystems.
HEADER.NOW_FRONTEND_DESC: Expertise in the Angular ecosystem and TypeScript, implementing solid design patterns like Singleton and MicroFE.
HEADER.NOW_PROBLEM_DESC: Strong debugging skills to optimize UI performance and streamline developer workflows.
HEADER.NOW_AI_DESC: Applying advanced AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini) to boost productivity and accelerate development tasks.
HEADER.NOW_COLLAB_DESC: Proven ability to lead and collaborate across teams to ensure high-quality, timely production deliveries.

PHILOSOPHY.TITLE: Core Philosophy
PHILOSOPHY.HIGHLIGHT: Code is for humans, execution is for machines.
PHILOSOPHY.DESC: > I believe in Clean Architecture and the power of Micro Frontends to build systems that aren't just scalable, but maintainable for years to come. My goal is to bridge the gap between complex UI/UX designs and high-performing technical reality, ensuring every pixel serves a purpose and every function runs with optimal performance.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Joined Projects
PROJECTS.REDOC_DESC: Digitalizing the real estate lifecycle through automated contract generation and secure online signing.
PROJECTS.LOYALTY_DESC: Architecting reusable web components and authentication flows for global service groups.
PROJECTS.OMSIM_DESC: Automating operational workflows for sales and customer care teams across Singapore, Malaysia, and New Zealand.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESC_1: I help you build scalable products and clean architectures.
CONTACT.DESC_2: I dedicate 4 hours of "deep work" daily to ship high-quality code for your MVP.
